item.description:
That trail goes to Battery Point and we could take a different one back to the Audubon Parking lot, making a nice loop.

The photo for this meetup is a map of the proposed trail.

Also see the Audubon's site for directions

PS I scheduled this one a little early because I have to get back earlier that day.
item.how_to_find_us: There are signs on Route 28 By Pass that lead you to the Audubon's Parking lot

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Massabessic - Audubon to Battery Point
